metadata.title: CVE-2021-20303 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw found in function dataWindowForTile() of IlmImf/ImfTiledMisc.cpp. Anattacker who is able to submit a crafted file to be processed by OpenEXRcould trigger an integer overflow, leading to an out-of-bounds write on theheap. The greatest impact of this flaw is to application availability, withsome potential impact to data integrity as well.

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
